parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The hard shifting and slipping of the transmission can cause the vehicle to jerk or lurch, leading to loss of control, accidents, or near-miss situations.
symptoms: especially during acceleration or deceleration; the vehicle hesitates or slips when shifting from 1st to 2nd gear or from 2nd to 1st gear; the transmission makes a whining noise at specific speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the torque converter can cause the transmission to slip or hesitate, leading to loss of power, accidents, or near-miss situations.
symptoms: The transmission hesitates or slips when shifting gears
especially during acceleration or deceleration; the vehicle lurches or jerks when shifting from 1st to 2nd gear or from 2nd to 1st gear; the transmission makes a whining noise at specific speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the Auto Stop/Start system can cause the vehicle to jerk or lurch when restarting, leading to loss of control, accidents, or near-miss situations.
symptoms: The vehicle jerks or lurches when restarting from an Auto Stop; the transmission slips or hesitates when shifting gears after an Auto Stop; the vehicle feels like it has been hit from behind when restarting from an Auto Stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the outside mirrors to tilt when shifting into reverse can reduce visibility, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries when reversing.
symptoms: The outside mirrors do not tilt when shifting into reverse

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lane departure warning system can increase the risk of accidents or injuries by not alerting the driver when the vehicle drifts out of its lane.
symptoms: The lane departure warning alert does not function
failing to alert the driver when the vehicle drifts out of its lane.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sidewall Cracking Issue with Pirelli P Zero Nero Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sidewall cracking issue can lead to a sudden loss of tire pressure, causing loss of control, accidents, or strandings, potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: severe damage and cracks to the sidewalls of the tires
